general_info.summary: This text provides a comprehensive overview of Galgotias University, detailing its offerings for international students, campus life activities, administrative and support services, various academic schools, and key initiatives. It covers aspects like admissions, scholarships, student grievances, campus facilities, cultural events, and university governance, alongside important official links and contact information.

research_info.summary: This document outlines the various research initiatives and activities at Galgotias University, spanning areas such as research excellence, global engagement, interdisciplinary research, publications, organized events, international collaborations, faculty development programs, research awards, citations, and recognition for research centers. It also mentions specific aspects like research ethics, media outreach, student projects, and honorary professors.

academic_info.summary: This text outlines various academic and administrative sections of an educational institution. Key areas highlighted include the Academic Calendar, Learning Model with a Choice Based Credit System, Curriculum Design and Development, and the implementation of NEP-2020. It also mentions the Examination Cell, MOUs, downloadable forms, awards, and a holiday list.
